name: ConnectOAuthConfig_GetConnectOAuthConfig
description:
Gets the Connect OAuth configuration for the specified account.

**Note:** To use this function, you must be an account administrator and Connect must be enabled on your account.

## Related topics:
- [OAuth for DocuSign Connect](/platform/webhooks/connect/validation-and-security/oauth-connect/)

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

$block: A complex object describing a Connect OAuth configuration.

$ul: **authorizationServerUrl**: The token URL for your authorization server or OAuth service.
**clientId**: The client ID assigned to your app by your authorization server or OAuth service.
**clientSecret**: The secret value provided by your authorization server.
**scope**: The scopes that your app will request from the authorization server.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
